  "shopName": "Tagbot Gaming",
  "subject": "🎄 Get Ready for the Great American Savings Fest, Pradeep Kumar! 🎉",
  "body": "🎮🔥 Hey Pradeep Kumar, we're excited to announce the Great American Savings Fest starting on December 25th! Get ready for amazing deals on gaming accessories and tech products. 🎁🎉

🖥️ Upgrade your gaming setup with our top picks: Gaming Chairs, Gaming Monitors, and Gaming Controllers. 🎮🎧

🌟 Don't miss out on the latest gaming consoles and popular video games! 🎮🎮

🎄🎁 Use coupon code **FIRST20** for 20% off your first purchase. Shop now at www.tagbotgaming.com. 🎄🎁

Happy gaming, Pradeep Kumar! 🚀

Best regards,
Tagbot Gaming Shop"
}
